description:
- Friendship is so beautiful, and so foolish! -
The climax of Keter`s Challenge has finally arrived! Has Keter been in Michael all along?!
Or is Gabriel the impostor?! Neither side will yield, and a heated battle unfolds.
Seeing the terrible fate that has befallen her former comrades,
Lucifer forcibly ends the Trial of Light and races toward the Heavens...!
Source: YouTube
